attributes.action: Reinstate the ban on Pet Prescription Charges or introduce a flat fee of £5
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since the ban on Pet Prescription Charging was lifted, pet owners are being hit with not only ridiculously high prescription charges (up to £18) but also item prices at least 3 times as much as the online prices.  

The proposal is to reinstate the ban or introduce a flat fee of £5 for the admin.
